```{r}
download.file("https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/10x.files/samples/cell/pbmc3k/pbmc3k_filtered_gene_bc_matrices.tar.gz", destfile = "pbmc3k_filtered_gene_bc_matrices.tar.gz")
```

```{bash}
tar xzf pbmc3k_filtered_gene_bc_matrices.tar.gz 
```

```{r}
install.packages(c("Seurat", "dplyr"))

library(Seurat)
library(dplyr)

# Load the PBMC dataset
pbmc.data <- Read10X("/cloud/project/filtered_gene_bc_matrices/hg19/")
```
